message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd be a great fit for it. I'm asking for $120 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase the product, but I am only able to pay up to $90 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $90.  Could you meet me halfway at $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I am still unable to meet at $105, but I would like to propose $100 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
